text: There are several notable people with the surname Orenstein. * Alexander Jeremiah Orenstein, South African medical scientist and army general * Henry Orenstein, American poker player and entrepreneur * Henry Orenstein (painter), Canadian artist * Joan Orenstein, Canadian actress * Leo Orenstein, Canadian television producer and director * Peggy Orenstein, American writer * Toby Orenstein, an American theatrical director, producer, and educator * Walter Orenstein, American vaccinologist * Zigu Ornea (born Orenstein or Ornstein), Romanian cultural historian ==See also== * Orenstein and Koppel * Ornstein Category:Jewish surnames
title: Orenstein
